properties.areaDesc: Spartanburg; Greenville Mountains; Mecklenburg; Cherokee; Greater Greenville; Union; York; Cabarrus
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 15 at 5:13AM EST until January 15 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog.

* WHERE...In South Carolina, Greenville Mountains, Greater
Greenville, Spartanburg, Cherokee and York Counties. In North
Carolina, Mecklenburg, Cabarrus and Union Counties.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Motorists traveling I-85 between the
Greenville area and the North Carolina border, and I-26 from the
Spartanburg area into North Carolina, and other roads and
highways across the area should be prepared for adverse driving
conditions.
properties.instruction:
If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of
distance ahead of you.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING
